li.text:
Gaurkyries - a subspecies of the Valkyries. Very slow but very strong fighters.<color=#a2adff>

- Huge melee damage.
- Move very slowly.
- Produce Gauranlen seeds once per year.
- Immune to extreme temperatures. Instead of heatstroke and hypothermia, they get "saturation" which temporarily enhances them.
- Always sleep on the floor like dryads.
- Receive dryad bonuses from the "Gauranlen supremacy" meme (Alpha memes)</color>

li.label: Enable wanderer event
li.tooltip: Unlocks the event. The event chance is configured in the "General" tab.
